sentences.sContent: The competition was sponsored by British Airways.
sentences.sCn: 此项比赛由英国航空公司赞助。

sentences.sContent: ...Why do state art councils help sponsor local arts and crafts festivals...
...State art councils help sponsor local arts and crafts festivals which draw crowds of tourist consumers...
...should not have been allowed to sponsor the World Cup...

remMethod.val: spon(看作spoon， 勺子) ＋ sor(…者) → 举勺子的人 → 发起者

words.tran: 赞助；发起；保证人的地位；教父母身份

trans.tranOther: to give money to a sports event, theatre, institution etc, especially in exchange for the right to advertise
